text: Universal Sports was an American sports-oriented digital cable and satellite television network. It was owned as a joint venture between InterMedia Partners and NBCUniversal. It was launched in 2006. On October 22, 2015, it was announced that Universal Sports would shut down on November 16, 2015, and that NBC Sports would inherit the network's portfolio of sports rights for its own networks. Category:American television channels Category:NBCUniversal Category:2006 establishments in the United States Category:2015 disestablishments in the United States
title: Universal Sports
